I’m running to fight for Medicare for All, universal pre-K, debt-free college & more. To guarantee middle-class families a pay increase of up to $500/mo with the largest working-class tax cut in decades — paid for by reversing this Admin’s gifts to big corporations & the top 1%.

Climate change is real and it’s happening now. From wildfires in the west to hurricanes in the east to floods and droughts in America’s heartland, we must speak this truth based on science fact, not science fiction.

Our economy isn’t working for working people. The cost of living is going up, but paychecks aren’t keeping up. People are drowning in debt. For the first time, we have a whole generation of Americans living with the sinking belief that they may not do as well as their parents.

When American families are living paycheck to paycheck, what is this Administration’s response? They tried to take away health insurance from millions, gave away a trillion $ to the biggest corporations in America & tried to blame immigrants as the source of our economic woes.

We have leaders who lie, bully, attack a free press, and undermine our democratic institutions. We’ve had children in cages crying for their mothers and fathers. We have leaders who attack public schools and vilify public school teachers. That’s not our America.

The American Dream and our American democracy are under attack and on the line like never before. We must answer a fundamental question: who are we as Americans? So, let’s answer that question. To the world. To each other. Right here. Right now.

America, we are better than this.
